page_default_title: Icebox.com - World Famous Natural Diamond Jewelers Solid Gold & VS Diamonds
page_default_description: A stunning collection of fine jewelry and luxury timepieces at Icebox.com. Explore exquisite diamond rings, elegant necklaces, and glamorous watches that will elevate your style. Shop now and indulge in the brilliance of Icebox.com.

pageReviews.title: Got my Christmas gift from Icebox!
pageReviews.text: I often hear people say how Atlanta is a small city and that you run into people you know all over town or that everyone eats/shops at the same spots. I walked into this store about two weeks ago on my own without ever mentioning the name of the place to my husband. All he knew was that I saw some earrings and a Rolex that I liked. Well earlier this week, I saw our credit card statement and of all the stores in town, it showed that he got my Christmas gift from Icebox.
pageReviews.author: Saira G.

pageReviews.title: Customer service is always good!
pageReviews.text: Best place to go for a gift on any occasion.. Customer service is always good and top notch at IceBox. No matter what the budget they always have something that fits my needs. I have personally referred friends and family to IceBox and they leave out a happy customer.
pageReviews.author: Jessica M.
